vulnerabilities.title: Path traversal in Node-RED-Dashboard
vulnerabilities.description: In Node-RED-Dashboard before 2.26.2 there is a path traversal vulnerability. It allows ui_base/js/..%2f directory traversal to read files.

vulnerabilities.title: node-red-dashboard vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
vulnerabilities.description: node-red-dashboard contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file `components/ui-component/ui-component-ctrl.js` of the component ui_text Format Handler. The attack may be initiated remotely. The issue is patched in version 3.2.0.
